title: 820-00138 freeze during boot
message: when it turns on some times it boots to os then shuts off the cpu gets hot i tried asd but it to freezes

title: 820-00138 freeze during boot
message:
If you get into macOS, switch to iGPU and see if stays on then; use gfxcardstatus for this.

However could be a problem caused by FDMF6808N chips.
Some scripts available on Internet, to disable CPU sleep states...

title: 820-00138 freeze during boot
message: it only has one video car the iris pro gfxcardstatus will not work

title: 820-00138 freeze during boot
message: Is true, then try the script mod to disable CPU sleep states...
